verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּהָכִ֞ין <S%H3559><s%> had established מַלְכ֤וּת <S%H4438><s%> the kingdom רְחַבְעָם֙ <S%H7346><s%> And it came to pass when Rehoboam וּכְחֶזְקָת֔וֹ <S%H2393><s%> and had strengthened עָזַ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> himself he forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> the law יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with פ

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came בַּשָּׁנָ֤ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַֽחֲמִישִׁית֙ <S%H2549><s%> And it came to pass [that] in the fifth לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king רְחַבְעָ֔ם <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam עָלָ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> came up שִׁישַׁ֥ק <S%H7895><s%> Shishak מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because מָעֲל֖וּ <S%H4603><s%> because they had transgressed בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD

בְּאֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמָאתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred רֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots וּבְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> and threescore אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> were without מִסְפָּ֗ר <S%H4557><s%> [were] without number לָעָ֞ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> that came עִמּוֹ֙ <S%H5973><s%> from מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> with him out of Egypt לוּבִ֥ים <S%H3864><s%> the Lubims סֻכִּיִּ֖ים <S%H5525><s%> the Sukkiims וְכוּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H3569><s%> and the Ethiopians

וַיִּלְכֹּ֛ד <S%H3920><s%> And he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמְּצֻר֖וֹת <S%H4694><s%> the fenced אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> which [pertained] to Judah וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem ס

וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> Then came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְחַבְעָ֔ם <S%H7346><s%> to Rehoboam וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and [to] the princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נֶאֶסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> that were gathered together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because שִׁישָׁ֑ק <S%H7895><s%> of Shishak וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֜ם כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> You עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5800><s%> Ye have forsaken אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> וְאַף־ <S%H637><s%> me and therefore have I also אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I עָזַ֥בְתִּי <S%H5800><s%> left אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> you in the hand שִׁישָֽׁק׃ <S%H7895><s%> of Shishak

וַיִּכָּנְע֥וּ <S%H3665><s%> humbled שָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> Whereupon the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> themselves and they said צַדִּ֥יק ׀ <S%H6662><s%> [is] righteous יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD

וּבִרְא֤וֹת <S%H7200><s%> saw יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And when the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נִכְנָ֔עוּ <S%H3665><s%> that they humbled הָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> themselves the word יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה ׀ <S%H8098><s%> came to Shemaiah לֵאמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> saying נִכְנְע֖וּ <S%H3665><s%> They have humbled לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אַשְׁחִיתֵ֑ם <S%H7843><s%> themselves [therefore] I will not destroy וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> them but I will grant לָהֶ֤ם <S%H1992><s%> them כִּמְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> them some לִפְלֵיטָ֔ה <S%H6413><s%> deliverance וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִתַּ֧ךְ <S%H5413><s%> shall not be poured out חֲמָתִ֛י <S%H2534><s%> and my wrath בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand שִׁישָֽׁק׃ <S%H7895><s%> of Shishak

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יִהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> will become ל֖וֹ לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <S%H5650><s%> Nevertheless they shall be his servants וְיֵדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> that they may know עֲב֣וֹדָתִ֔י <S%H5656><s%> my service וַעֲבוֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> and the service מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> of the kingdoms הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> of the countries ס

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up שִׁישַׁ֥ק <S%H7895><s%> So Shishak מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַיִם֮ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִַם֒ <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹצְר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> the treasures בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> everything לָקָ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> he took וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> all he carried away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָגִנֵּ֣י <S%H4043><s%> also the shields הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had made שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> which Solomon

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Instead of which king רְחַבְעָם֙ <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam תַּחְתֵּיהֶ֔ם <S%H8478><s%> their place מָגִנֵּ֖י <S%H4043><s%> shields נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass וְהִפְקִ֗יד <S%H6485><s%> and committed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> [them] to the hands שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> of the chief הָרָצִ֔ים <S%H7323><s%> of the guard הַשֹּׁ֣מְרִ֔ים <S%H8104><s%> that kept פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> the entrance בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> become מִדֵּי־ <S%H1767><s%> And when ב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> entered הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> came הָרָצִים֙ <S%H7323><s%> the guard וּנְשָׂא֔וּם <S%H5375><s%> and fetched וֶהֱשִׁב֖וּם <S%H7725><s%> them and brought them again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תָּ֥א <S%H8372><s%> chamber הָרָצִֽים׃ <S%H7323><s%> into the guard

וּבְהִכָּֽנְע֗וֹ <S%H3665><s%> And when he humbled שָׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> turned מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at אַף־ <S%H639><s%> himself the wrath יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not לְהַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H7843><s%> from him that he would not destroy לְכָלָ֑ה <S%H3617><s%> [him] altogether וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> and also בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and also in Judah הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become דְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> things טוֹבִֽים׃ <S%H2896><s%> went well ס

וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֞ק <S%H2388><s%> strengthened הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So king רְחַבְעָ֛ם <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> himself in Jerusalem וַיִּמְלֹ֑ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Now בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> old אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> and forty וְאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> [was] one שָׁנָה֩ <S%H8141><s%> years רְחַבְעָ֨ם <S%H7346><s%> for Rehoboam בְּמָלְכ֜וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּֽשֲׁבַ֨ע <S%H7651><s%> seven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֣ה ׀ <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem הָ֠עִיר <S%H5892><s%> the city אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּחַ֨ר <S%H977><s%> had chosen יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לָשׂ֨וּם <S%H7760><s%> to put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> there And his mother's נַעֲמָ֖ה <S%H5279><s%> [was] Naamah הָֽעַמֹּנִֽית׃ <S%H5985><s%> an Ammonitess

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not הֵכִין֙ <S%H3559><s%> because he prepared לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> not his heart לִדְר֖וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

וְדִבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> Now the acts רְחַבְעָ֗ם <S%H7346><s%> of Rehoboam הָרִאשֹׁנִים֙ <S%H7223><s%> first וְהָאֲ֣חַרוֹנִ֔ים <S%H314><s%> and last הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֨ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֜ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written בְּדִבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> in the book שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah הַנָּבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וְעִדּ֥וֹ <S%H5714><s%> and of Iddo הַחֹזֶ֖ה <S%H2374><s%> the seer לְהִתְיַחֵ֑שׂ <S%H3187><s%> concerning genealogies וּמִלְחֲמ֧וֹת <S%H4421><s%> ? And [there were] wars רְחַבְעָ֛ם <S%H7346><s%> between Rehoboam וְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> continually

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept רְחַבְעָם֙ <S%H7346><s%> And Rehoboam עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אֲבִיָּ֥ה <S%H29><s%> and Abijah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ
